summary: Land area calculator app ('SPA For Accurate Measure') with PWA support, installable as a native app. Uses a barn logo as the app icon with white theme color.
architectural_notes: PWA: App name 'SPA For Accurate Measure', short name 'SPA Measure', theme color white
Land area calculator supports rotation-based area calculation with results in m², acres, and hectares
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Barn logo illustration with arched uppercase text 'SPA FOR ACCURATE MEASURE' above a hand-drawn barn, 'BARN' label below barn, and cursive tagline 'For accurate measure' beneath, dark gray on white background, square format (icon-192x192.dim_192x192.png)
- Barn logo illustration with arched uppercase text 'SPA FOR ACCURATE MEASURE' above a hand-drawn barn, 'BARN' label below barn, and cursive tagline 'For accurate measure' beneath, dark gray on white background, square format (icon-512x512.dim_512x512.png)
- Barn logo illustration with arched uppercase text 'SPA FOR ACCURATE MEASURE' above a hand-drawn barn, 'BARN' label below barn, and cursive tagline 'For accurate measure' beneath, dark gray on white background, square format (apple-touch-icon-180x180.dim_180x180.png)

existing_features.title: Generate the 'SPA FOR ACCURATE MEASURE' barn logo image (white background, dark gray barn illustration with arched text and 'For accurate measure' tagline) in all required PWA icon sizes: 192×192, 512×512, and 180×180 (Apple Touch Icon). Save them as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated/.

Update frontend/public/manifest.json to use the generated barn logo icons: set the 192×192 and 512×512 icons to point to the generated asset paths, set app name to 'SPA For Accurate Measure', short_name to 'SPA Measure', background_color to '#ffffff', theme_color to '#ffffff', display to 'standalone', and start_url to '/'.

Update frontend/index.html to reference the generated apple-touch-icon (180×180) in the <link rel='apple-touch-icon'> tag and ensure the <link rel='manifest'> points to /manifest.json. Verify theme-color meta tag is set to '#ffffff'.

Ensure frontend/public/sw.js (service worker) is correctly registered and caches the app shell so the app works offline and qualifies for the browser's 'Add to Home Screen' / install prompt on both iOS and Android.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add PWA support (web manifest + service worker) so the app is installable as a native app on iOS & Android
Use 'SPA FOR ACCURATE MEASURE' barn logo as the app icon with all required PWA icon sizes
